verses.verse: Soldiers of Christ, arise, And put your armor on, Strong in the strength which God supplies Through His eternal Son; Strong in the Lord of hosts, And in His mighty power, Who in the strength of Jesus trusts Is more than conqueror.

Stand, then, in His great might, With all His strength endued; But take, to arm you for the fight, The panoply of God; That, having all things done, And all your conflicts passed, You may o'ercome thro' Christ alone, And stand entire at last.
